page.title: 11SWEB LOCAL OFFICE
page.content: The office covers mid and East Cornwall. Trevor Selwood is the distribution engineer responsible for a work force of 130. 30 office-staff and 100 industrial staff (linesmen, fitters, joiners etc.) There are 4 departments, each having an engineer in charge. i) Planning - ii) Construction - iii) Maintenance - iv) Services and Meters Inspection. Its functions are i) electricity supply - ii) maintenance of overhead and underground cables. - iii) providing new supplies - iv) street lights and metres v) storing equipment needed. There is a seperate unit to deal with bills and appliances, but soon both will be located in the new building being built at Loswithiel Road. ECLP consume Â£3 million worth of electriciy on average every year
